name: Tribe of the Giant
description:
Tribe of the Giant

By Merlijn Van Holder - @MerlijnVH

Ludum Dare - Timelapse - Postmortem

Some gameplay mechanics don't work too well. With the game being made in under 48 hours for Ludum Dare, I ran out of time.

Two tribes, each led by a giant, are at war in their connected world. Send your creatures through the gate to bring down their totem, but be careful of the dark tribe, not to let them get yours.

  1. Move your giant on the beat by clicking with the mouse.
  2. Chase creatures of the dark tribe to automatically suck them up!
  3. Creatures that are sucked up are converted to your tribe and spit out.
  4. When a dark creature occupies a house in your village, your totem lowers.
  5. When your totem is buried, you lose!
